cleaned_text: Dr. Jordan C Kopcio D.C. NMD Naturopathic Physician930 W Broadway Rd 3 Tempe Arizona, 85282 [Show map](#) About Dr. Jordan Kopcio is a naturopathic physician practicing in Tempe, AZ. Dr. Kopcio specializes in proactive prevention and treatment. Dr. Kopcio combines holistic healing methods with traditional solutions to medical illness. Providing both individual and family care, the most common ailments treated are Orthopedics and Sports Medicine injuries such as: back pain, neck pain, knee pain, hip pain, shoulder pain, tendon and ligament injury, etc. Naturopathic Physicians place a strong emphasis on natural remedies that add to the broad spectrum of remedies available.
